attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: End the farce of the last two decades, when we have been ruled by two minority party governments from minority election votes, causing the silent majority to lose representation and connection with our diminishing democratic system. The two parties who  benefited have become unrepresentative of those who most need help, are growing in numbers and being left behind.

rejection.details: you need to create a title for your petition, not your name
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
